Reviews.Title: “Very nice location”
Reviews.Author: leex
Reviews.Content: Stayed here a few years ago with my wife. Fantastic hotel in a wonderful location overlooking the waterfront. It is located in Kowloon - excellent choice of restaurants, bars and shopping at your doorstep.

Reviews.Title: “Weekend in HK”
Reviews.Author: Global Nomad I
Reviews.Content: A fairly average stay. Location is very good, but service was lacking, hotel is getting old, rooms were nice. But would look for somewhere different next time.

Reviews.Title: “Incredibly uneven experiences, but a good location in TST”
Reviews.Author: RickinShelby
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at this hotel 4 or 5 times in both rooms and suites in the standard floors and the executive floors. Frankly, if you can affored to stay on the executive floor, with it's segmented arrival area upstairs, it is quite nice as are these far more deluxe rooms/suites. However, the rooms on the standard floors are dark and dingy by contrast. Therefore, while my overall rating is a 3, the executive floors rate a solid 4 while the standard rooms alone rate a 2. That said, even on the executive floor up on top, the views of the harbour are a bit covered by the Intercontinental (former Regent, I think) next door. With all of that in mind, the location of this hotel is it's best feature -- the pedestrian walk goes right to the trainline making corder crossing to China easy, Likewise, it is close to the Star Ferry and all that TST offers.

Reviews.AuthorLocation: Delhielhi, National Capital Territory of Delhi, India
Reviews.Title: “Great Place to be...”
Reviews.Author: subramanyan_nv
Reviews.Content: I have stayed at many hotels in the past but this one really made me happy. Price wise it is certainly on the higher side but the overall experience made it good. The staff are certainly very cooperative and friendly. And the fact that most of them understand and speak English makes communicating very easy. They are social at just the right level and they go to great length to make you feel at home - whether it be in helping with the room or telling you about places to see around in the city. And I loved the comlimentary fruits they would give every evening. And I certainly loved the great gym facility and never missed an opportunity to work out. The room I had was compact and pretty; the breakfast is certainly good and the distance to the Metro/Cab station/bus stand is very little which is a great help. This is a place I would definitely want to come back to and recommend to your friends.

HotelInfo.Name: Renaissance Kowloon
HotelInfo.Address: Salibury Road - Tsimshatsui, 22, Hong Kong, China
